name: Frigid (fiabot)
description:
Lost in a frozen forest you must try to survive through the next day. Build fires to stay warm and hunt rabbits to avoid starvation. But for how long must you continue on like this? 

Frigid is a lonely survival game that provides commentary on the nature of survival. You must trudge through every day, constantly doing what you need to survive with no reprieve. Although this is technically a game, the goal is to invoke a mood more than anything else.

Submitted for Union College Game Jam.  

Credits: 

Game Design/ coding - Fiabot

Art - Fiabot 

SFX - B.G.M, Little Robot Sound Factory, Dusty Room 

Music - SD Sound Tracks, Little Robot Sound Factory
